data.name: The Rabbit and The Owl - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Rabbit and The Owl Original Soundtrack contains over 50 minutes of beautiful, atmospheric music. It was produced by David Huff (producer and editor) and Patrick Neff (pianist) of Endlight Productions.

Track List:
1. Genesis (1:15)
2. Journey Ahead (4:32)
3. Through the Trees (2:40)
4. Fern Rays (4:57)
5. Platform Gazing (3:30)
6. Sky Garden (3:32)
7. Oasis (3:12)
8. Rabbit's Run (3:12)
9. Drifting (3:02)
10. Creator (3:28)
11. Hanakotoba (4:48)
12. Barrier (3:21)
13. Sea Kings (3:41)
14. Spectrum (2:38)
15. Waiting (2:35)
16. Contact (2:36)

Note: The content of this soundtrack will be downloaded to your installation directory. You can either listen to the MP3 files directly or use the music player that is built into Steam Overlay (Shift + Tab).
